thread.title: Watch A Unique Take on Salads At The Great Indian Restaurant Festival
thread.title_full: Watch A Unique Take on Salads At The Great Indian Restaurant Festival

author: Hinakshi Bhatia
title: Watch A Unique Take on Salads At The Great Indian Restaurant Festival
text:
Subscribe to MensXP Watch A Unique Take on Salads At The Great Indian Restaurant Festival 
Salad is probably one of the most versatile dishes out there and it doesn’t always has to be raw vegetables with some dressing. Watch this video of the preparation of the Del Compressed Salad by Del, Roseate House which highlights a different take on this traditional dish. 
Dineout is organising India's first restaurant festival also known as ‘ Great Indian Restaurant Festival ’, where you can try the scrumptious ravioli yourself. The festival is being held between 1st February and 10th February with over 1,000 partnered restaurants who will be offering attractive discounts. 
You can avail offers from over five categories of discounts - 50% off Food, 50% off Buffets, Special Deals (specially curated menus), 50% off Alcoholic Beverages and 50% Off on Valentine’s Day Packages. 
Photo: © BCCL (Main Image)
